title.rendered: Vantage Markets Explores Future of Sustainable Mobility in Latest Episode of The Vantage View

content.rendered:
Vantage Markets (“Vantage”), a celebrated multi-asset broker, is excited to present the third installment of its insightful series, The Vantage View. This episode, produced in partnership with Bloomberg Media Studios, offers an in-depth look into the investment potential and transformative trends within Asia’s sustainable mobility sector, featuring expertise from Andrey Berdichevskiy of Boston Consulting Group (BCG).

Andrey Berdichevskiy, a leading voice at BCG’s Southeast Asia Centre for Climate & Sustainability, shares his analysis on the evolving landscape of the global automotive market, focusing on the surge in Battery Electric Vehicles (BEVs) adoption. Berdichevskiy forecasts that BEVs will constitute 59% of all light-vehicle sales by 2035, while the number of electric two-wheelers, predominantly in Asia, is expected to triple by 2040. These insights underline the crucial role Asia plays in the electric vehicle (EV) revolution.

Further, Berdichevskiy highlights several key investment avenues within the EV supply chain, from the sourcing of raw materials to advancements in battery technology and the development of charging solutions.

“We are thrilled to partner with Bloomberg Media Studios once again to bring forth this latest episode of The Vantage View, offering viewers unparalleled insights into the transformative potential of Asia’s electrified mobility landscape,” remarks Marc Despallieres, Chief Strategy and Trading Officer at Vantage. “As sustainable transportation continues to gain momentum globally, this episode is a timely exploration of the investment opportunities and emerging market trends that are defining the future of mobility.”
